description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              You will be required to attend 1month incentive training program (with allowance):
              
              -	In Australian Accounting Standard as well as Australian Tax Law and accounting software’s.
              
              -	To prepare financial statements and tax return for difference type of entities in Australia.
              

              You will be a recent graduate with good grades in Accountancy or Business studies degree from local Economics, Finances or Banking University. If you are currently study CAT, ACCA, ICAEW, CPA Australia or attended Australian Universities is an advantage.
              

              Successful candidates will work within a professional team of Australian and Vietnamese therefore your English skills must be excellent.
              

              For more information: http://scs-vietnam.com
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              •	Good communicator and a quick learner.
              
              •	Being proactive, flexible and able to work independently with regards to your own development.
              
              •	Having high attention to details.
              
              •	Being able to work within a team and having interpersonal abilities.
              
              •	Being self motivated.
              
              •	Being able to work under high pressure.
              
              •	Being organised.
              

              For more information: http://scs-vietnam.com
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
             








                15 days paid leave, Bonus and Awards
               







                Further studies (CPA Australia, Training Courses...etc)
               







                Travel oppotunities (Team activities, oversea travel)
